overview:
Joshua is the VP of Operations at PowerReviews, where he is responsible for managing the people and processes that support both retail partners and consumers. His mission is to improve the shopping experience by leveraging process and technology to improve PowerReviews’ consumer responsiveness while continually achieving greater levels of efficiency.

Being raised in the Silicon Valley has it advantages as the dinner table always had a new business idea to discuss. Prior to PowerReviews, Joshua worked as a software engineer at both AuctionDrop.com and Fogdog.com, as an analyst at Champion Ventures, and managed his own technology outsourcing company. Joshua’s extracurricular experience playing high level Ultimate Frisbee often translates very well when building the operations team.

Joshua holds a BS with majors in Business Finance and Computer Science from the University of Oregon.
